splash.title: NASAKA
splash.subtitle: IEBC
splash.disclaimer: Etikira ukuri kwa njira yaaku ncionthe kona kati IEBC yaku irimethembere na ukore njira ya gutaana naguo.
splash.locationBlockedDescription: Tondeka etikira njira thi settings cia browser yaku na ucookie kairi

search.placeholder: Carira inkati IEBC na county, constituency, kana njira...
search.noMatchQuery: Ntirî kati ya "{{query}}". Geria carira gingi.
search.noOfficesInArea: Ntirî inkati IEBC thi nthuĩ yaku.

bottomSheet.locationAccessDesc: Etikira untu wa njira nconthe ukonye mbeca ya rugendo, ukore njira kuuma nja ya riumiri, na ukore njira ya kwihi kuri kati ino.
bottomSheet.confirmOffice: Antu baathii bathikonia kati ino iri yo
bottomSheet.within500m: Ni nthi ure mita 500 kuuma kati
bottomSheet.locationNotStored: Njira yaaku ya kuandikwa ntiri yo yigite
bottomSheet.oneConfirmation: Uthikonio umwe tu thi kithimi kimwe
bottomSheet.distanceAway: Uri mita {{distance}} kure. Tondeka wihi mita {{maxDistance}} kuuma kati ncionthe uthikonie.
bottomSheet.confirmationFailed: Kwaga gutuma uthikonio. Tondeka ugerie kairi.
bottomSheet.locationPermissionRequired: Untu wa njira nithi ncionthe uthikonie. Tondeka etikire untu wa njira na ugerie kairi.
bottomSheet.tapForGoogleMaps: Kanya kati ncionthe ukone njira ya Google Maps.

layers.iebcOfficesDesc: Injira ciothe cia inkati IEBC kuria guothe Kenya
layers.constituenciesDesc: Miriiri ya Parliament na inyoro thi Kenya utukuu mbuu IEBC. Kiumbe kimwe nikionyithia constituency imwe na kode yako na itwa ryako.
layers.healthcareFacilitiesDesc: Ugaĩ wa inkati cia umatiire kuria guothe (uthuku munji sana - uthobokia ncibiti nini)
layers.counties: Uthuku wa Atotonji ba Counties Kenya
layers.countiesDesc: Ugaĩ wa miriiri ya counties kuria guothe
layers.myLocationDesc: Oonia untu waaku wa riumiri thi map
layers.aboutLayersDesc: Garura turi kuri na mbere kana ithukanio ncionthe ugarure map ya kuona. Uthii ukonye turi nyinji na maps nyinji ncionthe ukone bubui.

contribute.title: Tuma Njira ya Kati Itaganua
contribute.description: Tuteere twoone inkati ciothe cia IEBC kuria guothe Kenya na kutuma uthuku wa njira bubui.
contribute.googleMapsPlaceholder: Tupia link ya Google Maps kana mariiri
contribute.uploadEvidenceDesc: Mbisha ya kati, ibura, kana uthui wamethembere niteeraga uthikonio
contribute.dragDropOrClick: Kururia na ureke kana kanya ncionthe utose
contribute.movePin: Kururia pin ncionthe ugarure njira bubui
contribute.submissionSuccessDesc: Gwitio riaku ritumirwe na rikarora ni antu baroraga.
contribute.submissionNote: Murio: Uthikonio wa antu niunduaga uthuku ubui. Ibwega muno!
contribute.errorLocation: Tondeka uhe mariiri ma njira ya kati
contribute.errorInvalidCoordinates: Mariiri mataabui. Tondeka urore latitude na longitude.
contribute.errorSubmissionFailed: Kwaga gutuma gwitio. Tondeka ugerie kairi.
contribute.errorLocationPermission: Untu wa njira waniirwe. Tondeka etikire untu wa njira.
contribute.errorLocationFailed: Kwaga gukora njira. Tondeka winke mariiri na moko.
contribute.parseError: Utari mutaabui. Tondeka utupia link ya Google Maps bubui kana mariiri.

uber.uberXDesc: Rugendo rwa oimuthenya na mbeca nini
